channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 02:36 Flow to the Kirovohrad region. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 02:36 Flow to the Kirovohrad region. Watch for further messages.#Kirovograd This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 23:00 pm alarm to Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 23:00 pm alarm to Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
